column1: The 29th Pick of the 2021 NBA Draft and new Nets Big Man Day'Ron Sharpe is doing an AmA on /r/GoNets today!
The 29th Pick of the 2021 NBA Draft and new Nets Big Man Day'Ron Sharpe is doing an AmA on /r/GoNets today!
2021 NBA Draft - #29 Pick: Day'Ron Sharpe (North Carolina)
[Winfield] New Nets draft picks Cam Thomas and Day'Ron Sharpe say no members of the Brooklyn Big 3 have reached out to them yet.
